metadata.description: A foreboding city gate forged from dark iron, adorned with twisted carvings of forgotten deities. The walls surrounding it seem to absorb the light around them.

atmosphere.lighting: Deep shadows, flickering torches casting eerie silhouettes
atmosphere.sounds: Distant screams, creaking iron, and muffled chanting

metadata.significance: Gateway to the cursed city of Nexarion, said to be home to unspeakable horrors.
